title: Person of Interest S1 E11 - Great scene between Reese & Finch
author: Morgs K
comment: The absolute greatest thing is that later, at the end of the episode, Finch actually pokes the perp in the eyes.
Love the subtle humor when Reese says ''Trask has been snapping pictures of her. Are we sure that means he wants to kill her?'' while taking pictures of her. :p
I love it when Finch says 'please stop' the look on Emerson's face is pure gold. These two actors have such great chemistry .
''Yes, I'm sure the CIA will be deeply impressed, when they SHOOT you.'' Lol I love this part
I started watching this show because of Jim Caviezel. Who knew I'd KEEP watching it because of Michael Emerson?
description:
A scene from the series return 
Aired 12/01/2012
Reese is wheelchair bound due to being shot by the CIA. This leaves Finch having to go out in the field  ... Reese tries to teach Finch some small yet effective self-defence techniques
